newsitem.title: UK: ASW sells Cardiff Wire unit to Hall.
newsitem.headline: ASW sells Cardiff Wire unit to Hall.

text.p: ASW (Holdings) Plc said on Tuesday it had agreed to sell its Cardiff Wire business to Hall Engineering (Holdings) Plc for 5.95 million stg.

"This transaction will be completed in November with the total consideration estimated to be 5.95 million stg of which 5.35 million stg will be paid in cash on completion and the balance will be paid on agreement on the completion accounts," ASW said in a statement.
Cardiff Wire manufactures a range of steel and wire products, the company said, adding that the transaction was part of planned disposals announced earlier in the year.
